extDescription.message: This extension release the memory of the inactive tabs after regular time.

normal.description: the string of buttons in the options page.

keyBind.description: the string of buttons in the options page.

setReleaseFileUrlTitle.message: Specifies the page to be used for memory release.

setTimerTitle.message: The time to unload of the inactive tab.

not_release.message: To temporarily prohibit the release of the URL of this tab.

remove_not_release.message: Cancel 'To temporarily prohibit the release of the URL of this tab'.

restore.message: The tabs before to crash are restored.

switch_not_release.message: Switch to temporarily prohibit the release or cancel.
switch_not_release.description: the menu in the options page.

no_release.message: Don't reload when the released tabs are activated.
no_release.description: a option menu name in author.

explanation.message: If you to used this options, to the following thing must be attention.
explanation.description: Description of the used Release Page

explanation_problem1.message: If this extension become invalid, the released tabs will be closed.
explanation_problem1.description: Explanation of the problem about 'the inside of expanded function'

explanation_solution.message: you run the popup menu 'The tabs before to crash are restored.' Immediately when this extension closed your tabs. The result, be restoring your closed tabs.
explanation_solution.description: Solution to when occured about the problem in this extension.

explanation_problem2.message: If you can't use the Internet, this item isn't to operate normally.
explanation_problem2.description: Description of problem related to the specified author site

explanation_problem3.message: If the server is down, this item isn't to operate normally.
explanation_problem3.description: Description of problem related to the specified author site

explanation_problem4.message: Information of the page you are viewing is leak to the outside.(URL or Title)
explanation_problem4.description: Description of problem related to the specified author site

assignment_title.description: a assignment options in the options menu

assignment_favicon.description: a assignment options in the options menu

forcibly_close_restore.message: If Google Chrome is crushed, the next startup restore the release tabs.
forcibly_close_restore.description: a other option in the options menu

remaiming_memory.message: If the remaining memory less than this, This extension run the releasing tab automatically
remaiming_memory.description: a other option in the options menu
